pr_title: FISH-341 Create GCP Secrets Cloud Config Source

timeline.message:
FISH-341 Initial Config source extension implementation

The core of the GCP secrets config source wiring has been implemented

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Add start of extension system to config sources

The extensions will require a base set command, get command and service.
This commit does the initial work to set that API up.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Share code with OAuth2 security mechanism

Some shared code existed between the OAuth2 security mechanism and the
GCP config source. This commit moves the duplicate code into a delegate
class to be used by both.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Add config source lifecycle handlers

New config sources need to react to being disabled or enabled. They need
to be able to start and stop independent of the config provider
configuration. This commit implements the lifecycle code in the
extension handlers to make this possible.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Add set and delete GCP secret functionality

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Rename custom config sources to cloud

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Utilise Jersey object mapper

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 PR cleanup and copyright headers

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 PR cleanup and copyright headers

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Integrate config extensions into modules dir

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Config admin console integration and NPE fix

The base get command would return a null pointer exception if the config
source hadn't been defined. Admin console integration for the ordinal
has also been added.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Make GCP command parameters optional

Make the command more usable by making the parameters optional, and
providing log warnings when if the parameters aren't provided.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Fix dynamic enable behaviour

Code copied from notifier assumes that the configuration is available by
default. This change allows for a null configuration, and will
reconfigure the configuration pointer when appropriate.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Add MP Config Extensions module to reactor

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Fix NPE checks on initialisation

There was an initial lingering NPE left from when the notifier code was
copied for the config sources caused by lazy initialisation of the
config sources.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-341 Add Admin Console Configuration Page
